title: Technical Instructor in Electronics and Robotics
text:
005122 
You will be: - carrying out Portable Appliance Tests (PAT) on the Faculty’s portable electrical appliances and that they are tested in accordance with the Faculty’s electrical safety procedures and systems of work 
- providing specialist technical instruction and support to the department’s undergraduate and post graduate students - ensuring where reasonably practical that necessary repairs to Faculty’s electrical / electronic equipment and services are carried out and recorded. You should have: - HNC in Electronics or Robotics or equivalent educational background. A proven record of appropriate achievement will offset standard educational requirements - experience of Portable Appliance Testing (PAT)- the ablity to repair electronic & electrical equipment to component level- substantial practical Electronics & Robotics experience at senior technician level International applicants from outside the EU will need to demonstrate their eligibility to work in the UK Share this job
